title: News24.com | Coronavirus pandemic 'accelerating': WHO chief
description: The new coronavirus pandemic is clearly "accelerating", the World Health Organisation has warned.
content:
The new coronavirus pandemic is clearly "accelerating", the World Health Organisation warned on Monday, but said it was still possible to "change the trajectory" of the outbreak.
The remarks came as the number of deaths soared past 15 000, with more than 341… [+2699 chars]
